name: Week Increment Google Calendar Custom View
description: Adds shortcuts to increment the custom week view for Google Calendar one week at a time.

01-up-week.description: Move backward one week in X-weeks custom view

02-down-week.description: Move forward one week in X-weeks custom view

03-left-day.description: Move backward one day in X-days custom view

04-right-day.description: Move forward one day in X-days custom view
